author: Anthony Corsini
comment: This is a very nice tip calculator. It's quick and clean and the colors are super bright. I'm a big fan of the interface and was glad to give up a "tip" of a dollar. However I have two suggestions: it would be nice to change colors for each screen (not really a complaint but hey I'm a big fan of customization). The second tip is to improve the interface just a little bit more by giving us the option to go back a screen just in case we make a mistake. Maybe a simple swipe back might be enough.
title: Quick, Clean, Colorful

author: Chris Hoopes
comment: This works really well and looks nice on my LG Watch Urbane. The only quirk is having to hold on the app to close instead of swiping it away like other apps. That was something to get used to. Other than that, very easy to use.
title: Nice app

author: Benson Hall
comment: Randomly popped up my phone, wouldn't swipe away and told me to check my phone. A bit annoyed. Otherwise it works. Keep it simple yo!
title: What?

author: S S
comment: Brought the app, after my watch moto 360 upgraded to LP5.1.1, it ask me to unlock again, on the phone side hit restore purchase is useless. Don't do a thing!!  Developer please fix your app!!

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Sunny, thanks for the feedback. We are currently looking into this problem and will do what we can to fix it. We will notify you once we update the app.

author: Bill Lukes
comment: Good concept, but conflicts with bottom beam area and launcher drawer on left side. Found very frustrating to work easily. Maybe you could make the diameter of the app smaller?
title: Probs w Moto 360 42mm

author: William Marshall
comment: The app is wonderful.   Being able to determine the amount of the tip on my Huawei watch is great.   It certainly is better than having to take out the phone to get amount is embarrassing to the other people at the table and to the server.
title: Perfect...

author: Jeff Sly
comment: Slider to enter dollars, then another slider to enter cents and percent.  Split took me here, not sure if you have to pay, or just rate it.
title: Great

author: jay ray
comment: Tired of trying to open and nothing happens. App says locked on phone, open phone app and it's shows more apps to download. Great useless circle. Back to my reliable calculator.

author: Jan Borgersen
comment: I have LOVED the UI for this app over the last year, but when my Moto 360 v2 updated to wear 2.0 I have been unable to unlock the splitting feature. It's a real shame. Please fix!

author: Albert Isaac
comment: But it's not detecting my previous purchase. Could you guys do something about this?  I've emailed multiple times about this now.
title: Love this app

author: Shaun Dunphy
comment: This completely takes the pain away of figuring out and splitting a rip between a group of people.
title: Very useful app

author: Holger Drallmeyer
comment: Had to uninstall, after entering the amount and percentage i got the calculated to amount. However, it was impossible to enter a new bill amount after that. I'm sure there is a trick to it but by the time i figure that one out I'm already out of the restaurant.
title: Doesn't work after first use

author: Alan Fregtman
comment: It works well on the watch but I don't understand why I got "app has stopped working" dialogs randomly on my phone when I'm not even using it. Why would a tip calculator need to do anything in the background?? It seems suspicious.

author: Charles Chuateco
comment: This is one of the best wear apps I have and use. The wear market is still so lacking. This is definitely a get it!!!
title: So handy!

author: Denny Neff
comment: Bogus start instructions that are difficult for me to find
title: Ease of use

author: James Em.
comment: Simple, clean, and easy. The fastest and best way to calculate tip at the table or register. The ability to tweak the numbers with a small swipe is just the best. This is so good, it should just come baked into Android Wear as a helpful utility.

author: Albert Clark
comment: Works great, you will have to pay to unlock one feature with this app 'Split Bill'. Otherwise it works great with my Android LG Urban watch.
title: Very Helpful

author: Brandon Folsom
comment: Using the dailer is hard at times and I would rather have a different way to input the number. But the looks are great
title: Good but the dail could be improved

author: Dalia Gonzalez
comment: Lets me dial in my bill but won't switch to the next screen on my zenwatch. Will try on another watch.
title: Fun but not helpful

author: adrian simental
comment: Guess it works as it should. Bit confusing at first but works.
title: Lol ok so....

author: Mike Turner
comment: This is a great app. It does just one job and it does it well. I only wish I could change the color to match my watch face.
title: Almost perfect

author: Daevid Vincent
comment: Get it? Handy. Because you wear it on your wrist! Seriously though. Great app and clever use of circular layout. Moto 360.2
title: Very handy

author: Heinz Seijas
comment: Won't work on Android Wear 2.0. Doesn't even show up on my list of apps

author: Stephen Heminger
comment: cant make it work.
title: broke

author: Ken Glenn
comment: I find this app very handy. The interface is simple and works well.
title: Very nice useful app

author: Michael White
comment: Nice, quick and simple.  Faster than getting out my phone and using an app there.

author: Sergio ruiz
comment: A must. Works flawless on my lg g watch
title: Best tip wear app

author: Carlos Pereira
comment: It works now. I am changing my rating. Thanks!

reply.author: Aeus Tech, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Carlos, we recently updated the app and fixed a bug related to non-English languages. Let us know if that works for you. Feel free to contact us at info(AT)aeustech.com

author: Joshua Gully
comment: I just realized I paid to much in tips usually...thank you
title: Moto 360 2

author: Jay Jones Tile
comment: Will not load on my Gear S3.

author: Itay Raz
comment: Not working don't buy the split!

author: Richard Dawson
comment: Convenient app for the times you wanna make your tips accurate.
title: Nice

author: Anna Wilschetz
comment: Can't download onto my Fossil Smartwatch :/

author: Gary B
comment: Great Idea for those who always like splitting the bill evenly

author: Adam Lamar
comment: Wearable Tip Calulator is one of the handiest apps I have loaded!
title: Tip Calulator is awesome!

author: Tony B.
comment: They did a great job on this app, hands down..
title: One of the best

author: Sean Carrel
comment: A must have!
title: Awesome on Moto 360 2 gen.

author: Terri Fisher
comment: Nice app and easy to use on Moto360 smartwatch.
title: Works nicely with Moto360

author: Traistaru Mihai
comment: Works well on my Moto 360
title: Simple, elegant, smart!

author: Mark Spencer
comment: Works great on my Asus Zenwatch ZW1.
title: Fantastic!
